  Here are examples with restrictions on peak heights, valley 

     heights, and runs



      Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
                     2  2                  
                    P  x  + P x - P + 1 = 0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 2, 4, 9, 21, 51, 127, 323, 835, 2188, 5798, 15511, 41835, 

  113634, 310572, 853467, 2356779, 6536382, 18199284, 50852019, 

  142547559, 400763223, 1129760415, 3192727797, 9043402501, 

  25669818476, 73007772802, 208023278209, 593742784829, 

  1697385471211, 4859761676391, 13933569346707, 40002464776083, 

  114988706524270, 330931069469828, 953467954114363, 

  2750016719520991, 7939655757745265, 22944749046030949, 

  66368199913921497, 192137918101841817, 556704809728838604, 

  1614282136160911722, 4684478925507420069, 13603677110519480289, 

  39532221379621112004, 114956499435014161638, 

  334496473194459009429, 973899740488107474693, 

  2837208756709314025578, 8270140811590103129028, 

  24119587499879368045581, 70380687801729972163737, 

  205473381836953330090977, 600161698382141668958313, 

  1753816895177229449263803, 5127391665653918424581931, 

  14996791899280244858336604, 43881711243248048262611670, 

  128453535912993825479057919, 376166554620363320971336899, 

  1101997131244113831001323618, 3229547920421385142120565580, 

  9468017265749942384739441267, 27766917351255946264000229811, 

  81459755507915876737297376646, 239056762740830735069669439852, 

  701774105036927170410592656651, 

  2060763101398061220299787957807, 

  6053261625552368838017538638577, 

  17785981695172350686294020499397, 

  52274487460035748810950928411209, 

  153681622703766437645990598724233, 

  451929928113276686826984901736388, 

  1329334277731700374912787442584082, 

  3911184337415864255099077969308357, 

  11510402374965653734436362305721089, 

  33882709435158403490429948661355518, 

  99762777233730236158474945885114348, 

  293804991106867190838370294149325217, 

  865461205861621792586606565768282577,

                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
   No peak height can belong to {2r+1} and no upward run can 

      belong to {2r+1}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
               2  4      2                        
              P  x  - P x  + 2 P x - P - x + 1 = 0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 5, 11, 21, 38, 71, 141, 289, 591, 1195, 2410, 

  4897, 10051, 20763, 42996, 89139, 185170, 385809, 806349, 

  1689573, 3547152, 7459715, 15714655, 33161821, 70095642, 

  148388521, 314562189, 667682057, 1418942341, 3019043353, 

  6430694846, 13712066501, 29267039821, 62526435497, 

  133702196862, 286144767575, 612898356788, 1313802789419, 

  2818355313905, 6050219376289, 12997006150051, 27938312227291, 

  60093863829978, 129336863764017, 278526493023669, 

  600140658894815, 1293817052688602, 2790727275210443, 

  6022523595652930, 13003148374098133, 28087955689627849, 

  60699685130074233, 131232341805600222, 283842366271793091, 

  614171313367945301, 1329450463608330073, 2878854640888733683, 

  6236301913435410111, 13514172366010215838, 

  29295575337558446409, 63527300795165372405, 

  137803516977287035979, 299018215521079857482, 

  649035611401385647707, 1409188859634497999067, 

  3060526057859749360383, 6648837608039977247662, 

  14448236154062203872257, 31405103383370788800770, 

  68280841857814146368745, 148493629362676250420513, 

  323016179561405963342199, 702822279052689912366886, 

  1529568547065351912873319, 3329599806941045312163139, 

  7249572186808590794870427, 15788018759438191233342967, 

  34390267373243533198753807, 74926244101663092562542786, 

  163275404828228450403523319, 355872105136950403733637630, 

  775803155879659276506904385, 1691576578129045961585136781, 

  3689032524663362394293200309, 8046596761505428021217169916, 

  17554530363206529745588090515, 38303791182187681570500761915, 

  83592684747927422149523801165, 182459802915261087720985997794, 

  398324519605613927702271248345, 869713748740776003281550064045, 

  1899256724141704741482251058193, 

  4148180850994150351584066414685, 

  9061436175362191205871996813385, 

  19797048339674135582071696744350, 

  43258021657168341823687532922621, 

  94535396712156040942952515580583]


                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
  No valley height can belong to {2r+1} and no upward run can 

     belong to {2r+1}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
               2  4      2                        
              P  x  - P x  + 2 P x - P - x + 1 = 0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 5, 11, 21, 38, 71, 141, 289, 591, 1195, 2410, 

  4897, 10051, 20763, 42996, 89139, 185170, 385809, 806349, 

  1689573, 3547152, 7459715, 15714655, 33161821, 70095642, 

  148388521, 314562189, 667682057, 1418942341, 3019043353, 

  6430694846, 13712066501, 29267039821, 62526435497, 

  133702196862, 286144767575, 612898356788, 1313802789419, 

  2818355313905, 6050219376289, 12997006150051, 27938312227291,

  60699685130074233, 131232341805600222, 283842366271793091, 

  614171313367945301, 1329450463608330073, 2878854640888733683, 

  6236301913435410111, 13514172366010215838, 

  29295575337558446409, 63527300795165372405, 

  137803516977287035979, 299018215521079857482, 

  649035611401385647707, 1409188859634497999067, 

  3060526057859749360383, 6648837608039977247662, 

  14448236154062203872257, 31405103383370788800770, 

  68280841857814146368745, 148493629362676250420513, 

  323016179561405963342199, 702822279052689912366886, 

  1529568547065351912873319, 3329599806941045312163139, 

  7249572186808590794870427, 15788018759438191233342967, 

  34390267373243533198753807, 74926244101663092562542786, 

  163275404828228450403523319, 355872105136950403733637630, 

  775803155879659276506904385, 1691576578129045961585136781,

  19797048339674135582071696744350,

                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
   No valley height can belong to {2r+1} and no flat run can 

      belong to {2r+1}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
        6    2  4        4    4        2      2            
     P x  + P  x  - 4 P x  + x  + 4 P x  - 2 x  - P + 1 = 0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 0, 2, 0, 6, 0, 21, 0, 78, 0, 300, 0, 1185, 0, 4782, 0, 19635, 

  0, 81777, 0, 344652, 0, 1467183, 0, 6299637, 0, 27250428, 0, 

  118645296, 0, 519531645, 0, 2286539844, 0, 10109184834, 0, 

  44877106266, 0, 199955943984, 0, 893917457439, 0, 

  4008541211040, 0, 18025587729474, 0, 81265926172179, 0, 

  367245742195689, 0, 1663248899064774, 0, 7548161932894272, 0, 

  34319987576819229, 0, 156321837231552168, 0, 

  713195935968268110, 0, 3258888744575752611, 0, 

  14912848400301801264, 0, 68335227935219336937, 0, 

  313536049329901428111, 0, 1440316020964035240816, 0, 

  6624099088217270981445, 0, 30497771037065872866801, 0, 

  140558531739435836941764, 0, 648442668831156789515331, 0, 

  2994265515149696040817701, 0, 13838658081883759228215048, 0, 

  64012465504278697180511127, 0, 296336558394062525158232460, 0, 

  1372904529987849245014064088, 0, 6365246471093687392249698957, 

  0, 29532226346064361983934184034, 0, 

  137110396297397121067778413224, 0, 

  636979956421718297002499327001, 0, 

  2961085903724136258696914586699, 0, 

  13773218998111464714729303194400, 0, 

  64101629579914170018303972244494]


                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
  No peak height, valley height, upward-run, downward-run, or 

     flat-run can belong to {2r+1}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
                     2  4      2            
                    P  x  + P x  - P + 1 = 0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 0, 1, 0, 2, 0, 4, 0, 9, 0, 21, 0, 51, 0, 127, 0, 323, 0, 835, 

  0, 2188, 0, 5798, 0, 15511, 0, 41835, 0, 113634, 0, 310572, 0, 

  853467, 0, 2356779, 0, 6536382, 0, 18199284, 0, 50852019, 0, 

  142547559, 0, 400763223, 0, 1129760415, 0, 3192727797, 0, 

  9043402501, 0, 25669818476, 0, 73007772802, 0, 208023278209, 0, 

  593742784829, 0, 1697385471211, 0, 4859761676391, 0, 

  13933569346707, 0, 40002464776083, 0, 114988706524270, 0, 

  330931069469828, 0, 953467954114363, 0, 2750016719520991, 0, 

  7939655757745265, 0, 22944749046030949, 0, 66368199913921497, 

  0, 192137918101841817, 0, 556704809728838604, 0, 

  1614282136160911722, 0, 4684478925507420069, 0, 

  13603677110519480289, 0, 39532221379621112004, 0, 

  114956499435014161638, 0, 334496473194459009429, 0, 

  973899740488107474693, 0, 2837208756709314025578]


                  ----------------------------


 Let a(n) be the number of Motzkin paths of length n with the 

    following restrictions
 No peak height can belong to {3*r+1} and no downward-run can 

    belong to {3*r+2}
The generating function P(x) of the sequence a(n) satisfies the 

   algebraic equation
  4  12      4  11      4  10      3  11      4  9      3  10
 P  x   + 2 P  x   - 3 P  x   + 2 P  x   - 2 P  x  + 5 P  x  

         4  8      3  9    2  10      4  7      3  8      2  9
    + 6 P  x  - 5 P  x  + P  x   - 4 P  x  - 7 P  x  + 5 P  x 

       4  6       3  7    2  8      3  6       2  7        8
    + P  x  + 12 P  x  + P  x  - 6 P  x  - 15 P  x  + 2 P x 

       3  5      2  6        7      2  5        6      2  4
    + P  x  + 7 P  x  + 3 P x  + 8 P  x  - 7 P x  - 8 P  x 

           5    6      2  3         4      4        2      3
    - 6 P x  + x  + 2 P  x  + 12 P x  - 4 x  - 8 P x  + 2 x 

                 2                  
    + 5 P x + 4 x  - P - 4 x + 1 = 0


           Here are the terms a(n) from n=0 to n=100

[1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 7, 22, 61, 156, 381, 913, 2185, 5266, 12811, 

  31435, 77652, 192776, 480414, 1201049, 3011234, 7569847, 

  19077777, 48195456, 122027697, 309613730, 787099072, 

  2004603564, 5114054869, 13067518414, 33440238880, 85695048426, 

  219895907492, 564964931682, 1453246202696, 3742337893621, 

  9647342574709, 24894877531361, 64302560950448, 166242654899750, 

  430163866475788, 1114000218664189, 2887222817692789, 

  7488655550682847, 19437560753533288, 50487137239813892, 

  131222509529802294, 341281570016132161, 888143667358538531, 

  2312645840100661556, 6025329136689554980, 15706843986684280072, 

  40966123622078557043, 106900650762572703096, 

  279092105382330768462, 728985813217838032027, 

  1904968946016964524197, 4980206551626819584873, 

  13025401072630546254542, 34081062231548965836497, 

  89208794632030066305198, 233598089825984607506584, 

  611917340002397597595962, 1603515342611421951378888, 

  4203447432933150493092630, 11022642681432655927747915, 

  28914062200468652485146690, 75870268175516887463489518, 

  199144943756593955792702003, 522875513232813920780539412, 

  1373267156950222092954139735, 3607746203416464814610063329, 

  9480642805147731298046316341, 24920527535496374431921418540, 

  65522615770706790571048271013, 172320440955932637960581568094, 

  453305599740308272163209668975, 

  1192755248940021873471839596094, 

  3139170518378622909349148239618, 

  8263789500383632126312205361508, 

  21759148542068093526568479108896, 

  57306052293286310516736763934458, 

  150956822899930586476705535614613, 

  397737426512536487969518733988032, 

  1048164635776853326565413319763187, 

  2762802397912276644651428911185791, 

  7283756864500376289938663491027539, 

  19206332133859875548863125700168286, 

  50654140999805529506521337702298146, 

  133618074509307819564698051228174925, 

  352527875801820988109811195562656558, 

  930246495379144884912153427864331029, 

  2455145983555812851920287724366626011, 

  6480816506028319281171431033670608975, 

  17110146708189713508785579292806028023, 

  45180170780197610342592197653666917431, 

  119319300465970165087093444739446519843, 

  315167071563362620663936289878578258571, 

  832601013848974694307025786043277453028, 

  2199873403468581275199611750504457360409,
